CustomField.description: This field displays any value in the Digicel Country field as the region that the country is associated to. So for example; if a users "Digicel Country" field is populated as "Jamaica", this field will display "CEO Market Cluster"
CustomField.formula: Case (Digicel_Country__c, "Anguilla", "West Indies Markets", "Antigua and Barbuda", "West Indies Markets", "Aruba", "South Caribbean", "Barbados", "South Caribbean", "Bermuda", "Atlantic Markets", "Bonaire", "South Caribbean", "Cayman Islands", "Atlantic Markets", "Curacao", "South Caribbean", "Dominica", "West Indies Markets", "El Salvador", "Large Opcos", "French Guiana", "Large Opcos", "Grenada", "West Indies Markets", "Guadeloupe", "Large Opcos", "Guyana", "South Caribbean", "Haiti", "Large Opcos", "Jamaica", "Large Opcos", "Martinique", "Large Opcos", "Panama", "Panama", "Saint Kitts and Nevis", "West Indies Markets", "Saint Lucia", "West Indies Markets", "Saint Vincent and the Grenadines", "West Indies Markets", "Suriname", "South Caribbean", "Tres Networks", "South Caribbean", "Trinidad and Tobago", "Large Opcos", "Turks and Caicos Islands", "Atlantic Markets", "BVI", "West Indies Markets", "FWI", "Large Opcos", "Fiji", "Pacific Islands", "PNG","PNG", "Samoa","Pacific Islands", "Vanuatu", "Pacific Islands", "Tonga","Pacific Islands", "Nauru","Pacific Islands", "Reunion","Large Opcos", "Mayotte","Large Opcos", "Group Business Team","GROUP", "Carrier Sales","GLOBAL", "Wholesale","GLOBAL", "Digicel International Business", "GLOBAL", "Indian Ocean", "Large Opcos", "Diaspora", "Diaspora", "Vendor","GROUP" ,"")
CustomField.label: Digicel Market Cluster
